import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import ArticleService from '../service/article' import walp from "../walp.jpg" const ArticleCard = ({ item, getArticles }) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const { loggedIn, user } = useSelector(state => state.auth) const deleteArticle = async slug => { try { await ArticleService.deleteArticle(slug) getArticles() } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (
{/*

{item.title}

{item.description}

more
{loggedIn && user.username === item.author.username && ( <> )}
{item.author.username}
) } export default ArticleCard
